org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.impl

Class NonBlockingInbox

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.impl.Inbox
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.impl.NonBlockingInbox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class NonBlockingInbox
extends Inbox
    The inbox used by NonBlockingReactor, ThreadBoundReactor and SwingBoundReactor, NonBlockingInbox uses a single ArrayDeque for the doLocal queue.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.impl.Inbox

        concurrentQueue

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NonBlockingInbox(int initialLocalQueueSize)
      Creates a NonBlockingInbox.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean hasWork()
      Returns true when there is a message in the inbox that can be processed.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Returns true when all the queues are empty.
      boolean isIdle()
      Returns true when the inbox is empty and no request messages are being processed in isolation.
      protected void offerLocal(RequestImpl msg)
      Add a message to the appropriate doLocal queue.
      RequestImpl poll()
      Retrieves and removes from the inbox the next message to be processed, or returns null if there are no messages that can be processed.

        public boolean hasWork()
        Description copied from class: Inbox
        Returns true when there is a message in the inbox that can be processed. (This method is not thread safe and must be called on the targetReactor's thread.)
